title: Concenate Files using FFMPEG
content: Example # Create file list echo file file1.mp4 > mylist.txt echo file file2.mp4 >> mylist.txt echo file file3.mp4 >> mylist.txt Concenate Files ffmpeg -f concat -i mylist.txt -c copy output.mp4 Sumber # Sumber

title: Screen Recording Using FFMPEG
content: Video Only # ffmpeg -f x11grab -s $(xdpyinfo | grep dimensions | awk {'print $2;'}) -i :0.0 out.mkv Audio Only # ffmpeg -f alsa -i default out.ogg Video & Audio # ffmpeg -f x11grab -s $(xdpyinfo | grep dimensions | awk {'print $2;'}) -i :0.0 -f alsa -i default out.mkv Sumber # Sumber
